pages.text: $(d)Spectre Chargers$() are used to charge items in your inventory using FE from your $(l:blocks/spectre_energy_injector)Spectre Energy buffer$(/l).$(br2)It will charge every item in your inventory that can be charged, including your armor and any equipped Curios.
pages.title: Spectre Chargers

pages.text: Each tier charges faster than the last.$(br2)The Genesis Spectre Charger is creative-only, and does not use energy from your buffer.
